original_text: There were 5,400 things made from gold and silver. Sheshbazzar took them all with him when he left Babylon to return to Jerusalem with the other exiles.
korean_text: 금, 은 그릇이 모두 오천사백 개라 사로잡힌 자를 바벨론에서 예루살렘으로 데리고 갈 때에 세스바살이 그 그릇들을 다 가지고 갔더라

sentences.original_text: There were 5,400 things made from gold and silver.
Sheshbazzar took them all with him
sentences.korean_translation: 스스바살은 그 모든 것을 가지고 갔습니다
